bibl.title: Symposion Rules.
bibl.note: Six lines of iambic trimeter, which seem to be a fragment of a new comedy (?) couched in Doric: someone prescribes the order of deities to be toasted at a symposion. Abusir el Melek, Augustan date. - P. 110: Hypothetical reconstruction by Colin Austin.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 107-111, 1 pl.

Six lines of iambic trimeter, which seem to be a fragment of a new comedy (?) couched in Doric: someone prescribes the order of deities to be toasted at a symposion. Abusir el Melek, Augustan date. - P. 110: Hypothetical reconstruction by Colin Austin.
